name: Animal Handling
shortDescription: Represents your ability to interact with low intelligence creatures.
fullDescrption: Represents your ability to interact with low intelligence creatures.

name: Athletics
shortDescription: Represents your ability to climb, swim, jump and other forms of physical movement.
fullDescrption: Represents your ability to climb, swim, jump and other forms of physical movement.

name: Deception
shortDescription: Represents your ability to deceive, twist the truth, act as someone else and confuse others with your words and actions.
fullDescrption: Represents your ability to deceive, twist the truth, act as someone else and confuse others with your words and actions.

name: Investigation
shortDescription: The ability to discern details, find hidden meanings, search for secret entrances/treasure, reach conclusions, figure out illusions.
fullDescrption: Investigation is used to discern details, find hidden meanings, search for hidden treasure or secret rooms, reach conclusions based on clues or figure out illusions.

name: Intimidation
shortDescription: Your ability to frighten others and make them act on your will.
fullDescrption: Your ability to frighten others and make them act on your will.

name: Medicine
shortDescription: Understanding of Medicine, the Anatomy of most living beings and knowledge of herbs, minerals and other substances with healing properties.
fullDescrption: Understanding of medical practices, the Anatomy of most living beings and knowledge of herbs, minerals and other substances with healing properties.

name: Persuasion
shortDescription: Your ability to sway others for your cause or convince them to aid you in your endeavours or barter with them.
fullDescrption: Your ability to sway others for your cause or convince them to aid you in your endeavours or barter with them.

name: Awareness
shortDescription: Represents your ability to notice threats, spot objects far away and making out details in a distance.
fullDescrption: Represents your ability to notice threats, spot objects far away and making out details in a distance, Awareness is assumed to take no more than a few seconds.

name: Stealth
shortDescription: Your ability to effectively hide or move silently.
fullDescrption: Your ability to effectively hide or move silently.

name: Survival
shortDescription: Your ability to navigate the Wilderness, scavenge for food as well as your general sense of direction.
fullDescrption: Your ability to navigate the Wilderness, scavenge for food as well as your general sense of direction.

name: Thievery
shortDescription: Thievery is used where fast and precise motions are required. It also allows you to lock pick locks and disarm traps with Thieves Tools.
fullDescrption: Thievery is used where fast and precise motions are required. It also allows you to lock pick locks and disarm traps with Thieves Tools.
